content:
TITLE: Installing Appium Opentelemetry Plugin via Plugin CLI
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the Opentelemetry plugin using Appium's plugin CLI. Shows installation both as a named plugin and via NPM package.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/appium-plugins/blob/main/packages/opentelemetry/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
appium plugin install opentelemetry
appium plugin install --source=npm @browserstack/opentelemetry-plugin
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Activating Appium Opentelemetry Plugin
DESCRIPTION: Command to activate the Opentelemetry plugin when starting the Appium server by specifying it in the plugins parameter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/appium-plugins/blob/main/packages/opentelemetry/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
appium --plugins=opentelemetry
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Activating Appium Plugins via Command Line
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Appium server with the Opentelemetry plugin activated. This allows the plugin to have an effect on the running server.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/appium-plugins/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
appium --plugins=opentelmetry
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Appium Opentelemetry Plugin from Local Source
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Opentelemetry plugin from a local directory path using Appium's plugin CLI with the local source option.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/appium-plugins/blob/main/packages/opentelemetry/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
appium plugin install <path-to-repo>/packages/opentelemetry --source local
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Development Environment
DESCRIPTION: Series of commands for bootstrapping, installing dependencies, and building the project for development purposes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/appium-plugins/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run bootstrap
npm install
npm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Unit Tests
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute unit tests for the Appium plugins project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/appium-plugins/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm test:unit
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Clean Command for Development
DESCRIPTION: Development command to clean the project. This is one way to prepare the project for development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/browserstack/appium-plugins/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run clean
```
